## IControllerPointerCancelEvent interface

Pointer cancel event for camera controllers.

Triggered when the pointer operation is canceled (e.g., touch canceled, system interruption).

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface IControllerPointerCancelEvent extends IControllerMouseEvent<'pointercancel'> 
```
**Extends:** [IControllerMouseEvent](doc/markdown/./scene.icontrollermouseevent.md)<!-- -->&lt;'pointercancel'&gt;
